title: When is URF
body: Wondering if anyone knows when it will comeback out just curious.

replies.body: After a few more poro king weekends
Don't forget about the few ascension weekends
dark star is next patch
Knowing Riot, never at this rate.

More like knowing Riot, they won't give us any information about it, and then it'll randomly come back in 4 months. Alternatively, maybe people will make a big enough fuss on the forums that they can't ignore us... doubtful, but maybe.

literally one of the most upvoted posts on the boards is entitled "UPVOTE FOR URF". I mean there's no way they didnt see it, they just dont like giving us fun game modes.

at least we get poro king and ascension~

URF is not coming back, because the community ruined it.

When Riot releases URF: _"Rito URF sucks everyone picks the same thing and just tryhards."_

When Riot disables URF: _"Rito pls i miss URF it my favourite mode."_

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

But hey, there is always Practice Tool.

_**Almighty.**_

You are as far from the truth as possible.
They are simply yet implementing it with new client.
What does community have to do with it.
You do know urf is available on the new client? we had it on new client back during the beta of it.

this doesn't actually guarantee that it's available now. In beta, normal client was running still. It's quite likely that during beta, riot's server ran old client, in which case even tho it was available during beta - it hadn't been on a new-client server yet.
Oh dang, I hadn't thought of that possibility...

You obviously haven't been to the Boards when URF is avalible.

_**Almighty.**_

Don't forget AR URF: "Regular URF was so much better, I can't even play my favorite champion one time over the weekend."

That being said, I don't think the community ruined it just because they're a bunch of salt miners. They complain more about Yasuo or their teammates, and the wind samurai and ranked are still a thing.
Why not make urf an OPTIONAL gamemode? FOREVER!

> [{quoted}](name=K TheSilverKing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JVowXQmV,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-07-10T21:36:33.672+0000)
>
> Why not make urf an OPTIONAL gamemode? FOREVER!

because its gets boring after a while
also remember to make it random so people don't pick the same shit every game like they do in poro king xD

When people find it boring they wont play it. People who dont find it boring will still play it. Aram gets boring after one game, but no one is saying that should be a rotating game mode. I would like URF to be here so when im tired of playing traditional league I can play something that isnt aram or TT (which are boring af)
Lol I thought this was binary but then I realized it was just a bunch of numbers

Any questions?
How many Ascension and Poro king are there?

> [{quoted}](name=AngelFrost00,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JVowXQmV,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2017-07-11T09:49:48.098+0000)
>
> How many Ascension and Poro king are there?

There are about as many Ascensions as Poro Kings.

I just counted.
When Riot needs to bump player count numbers to show to advertisers/investors in Esports.
Summary of other answers: random crap, guessing, or the most honest "I don't know." There simply isn't any information from Riot, intentional, leaked or otherwise regarding URF unfortunately... :/

THERE IS ONLY ONE WAY TO FIX THIS PLAGUE.
AND IT COMES FROM A FAR AWAY LAND.
_DOTA_
Seriously, their workshop system is fucking amazing.

The thing is Valve has the manpower 10x greater than Riot. DOTA 2 was developed with the pre-existing steam community market in mind. DOTA is developed on a stupidly costomizable engine. ( can't speak for leagues engine )
Thanks for the reply's seems like there is not a date set for it we just wait for now boys!
Shhhhhhh we don't talk about urf!
Riot, why can't semi-AR urf be a thing, where after 3 or however many amount of games played in urf you get to choose your champion for a game?  this would please both sides of the argument.

No. Just no.

That is a huge advantage. 

Legit huge.  Just no

do you have another way to solve their champion diversity issue with urf? while giving the players a chance to be able to try their own things instead of hoping they get the champ they want?

Let me know if you have a _plausible_ alternative

I'm saying what your proposing IS NOT plausible.

Also if you want to try your own thing you can still do it in custom.

Get 9 friends. Done.
but urf isn't in custom...
When urf is up... URF IS IN CUSTOM....
but thats the easy part.  not when 9 of your friends dont play league anymore.

Thats sorta your problem.

Your solution means one person or two people benefit at the cost of everyone else.

If you want to do ops or something that might go horribly? Do it with friends who are WILLING TO LOSE their time at your expense.
Soon™
After the Karma revert.
They buried it, and gave us something else while convincing us they're the same thing when they aren't.

Never, because fun is not allowed
~~bump~~
probably next year. and then it'll have an even worse random system that everyone will complain about even harder.

I'm wondering when Nemesis Draft is.  We have only ever had it a single time and that was by far my favorite mode.  Giving your enemy the worst team comp you can think of is hilarious.  I always had my team give them all ADC's and then we would just stack armor.
April 1st
